name: Superman
bio: Kal-El, also known as Superman, is the last son of Krypton and possesses superhuman strength, speed, and the ability to fly.

name: Batman
bio: Bruce Wayne, also known as Batman, is a billionaire vigilante who fights crime in Gotham City using his intelligence and advanced gadgets.

name: Wonder Woman
bio: Diana Prince, also known as Wonder Woman, is an Amazon princess and warrior with superhuman strength, speed, and combat skills.

name: The Flash
bio: Barry Allen, also known as The Flash, is a speedster with the ability to move at incredible speeds and manipulate the flow of time.

name: Green Lantern
bio: Hal Jordan, a member of the Green Lantern Corps, wields a power ring that allows him to create energy constructs and protect the universe.

name: Aquaman
bio: Arthur Curry, also known as Aquaman, is the king of Atlantis and possesses superhuman strength, the ability to breathe underwater, and communicate with sea creatures.

name: Cyborg
bio: Victor Stone, also known as Cyborg, is a half-human, half-machine superhero with enhanced strength, technopathy, and various high-tech abilities.

name: Green Arrow
bio: Oliver Queen, also known as Green Arrow, is a skilled archer and vigilante who fights crime in Star City using his archery skills and trick arrows.

name: Supergirl
bio: Kara Zor-El, also known as Supergirl, is Superman's cousin from Krypton and possesses similar superhuman abilities.

name: Shazam
bio: Billy Batson, when he says the word 'Shazam,' transforms into a superhero with the wisdom of Solomon, the strength of Hercules, and other godlike abilities.

name: Martian Manhunter
bio: J'onn J'onzz, also known as Martian Manhunter, is the last surviving Martian with shape-shifting, telepathy, and various other powers.

name: Black Canary
bio: Dinah Lance, also known as Black Canary, is a skilled martial artist with a powerful sonic scream called the Canary Cry.

name: Nightwing
bio: Dick Grayson, the original Robin, adopts the identity of Nightwing and fights crime as a skilled acrobat and detective.

name: Harley Quinn
bio: Harleen Quinzel, also known as Harley Quinn, is a former psychiatrist turned criminal and the Joker's frequent accomplice.

name: Zatanna
bio: Zatanna Zatara is a skilled magician and sorceress who can manipulate reality through the use of spoken spells.

name: Red Hood
bio: Jason Todd, formerly the second Robin, takes on the identity of Red Hood and becomes an antihero with exceptional combat skills.

name: Batwoman
bio: Kate Kane, also known as Batwoman, is a highly trained crime-fighter and vigilante who operates in Gotham City.

name: Constantine
bio: John Constantine is a streetwise magician and occult detective who battles supernatural forces and demons.

name: Raven
bio: Raven is a half-human, half-demon sorceress with dark powers and a member of the Teen Titans.

name: Wonder Woman
bio: Diana Prince, also known as Wonder Woman, is an Amazonian princess and warrior with superhuman strength, agility, and the power of flight. She uses her abilities to protect the innocent and fight for justice.

name: Batgirl
bio: Barbara Gordon, also known as Batgirl, is a highly skilled martial artist and detective who fights crime alongside Batman and the Bat Family.

name: Hawkgirl
bio: Shiera Sanders Hall, also known as Hawkgirl, is a reincarnated ancient Egyptian princess with the ability to fly and enhanced strength. She wields a mace in battle and fights alongside other superheroes as a member of the Justice League.

name: Zatara
bio: Giovanni Zatara, also known as Zatara, is a stage magician who possesses real magical powers. He can cast spells by speaking backward and uses his abilities to fight against supernatural threats.

name: Blue Beetle
bio: Jaime Reyes, also known as Blue Beetle, is a teenager who gains a powerful alien scarab that fuses to his spine. The scarab provides him with a high-tech suit and various abilities to fight crime.

name: Vixen
bio: Mari McCabe, also known as Vixen, possesses the ability to harness the powers of animals through a mystical totem. She can mimic the abilities of any animal and uses her powers to protect the innocent.

name: Firestorm
bio: Ronnie Raymond and Martin Stein merge to become Firestorm, a superhero with the power to transmute elements and create nuclear energy. They use their combined abilities to fight against villains and protect the world.

name: Atom
bio: Ray Palmer, also known as Atom, has the ability to shrink his body to subatomic levels while retaining his full strength. He uses his size-changing powers and scientific knowledge to fight crime and explore the microscopic world.

name: Huntress
bio: Helena Bertinelli, also known as Huntress, is a skilled vigilante and expert marksman. She seeks justice for her murdered family and fights against organized crime in Gotham City.

name: Mera
bio: Mera is the queen of Atlantis and possesses the ability to manipulate water, control its density, and communicate with aquatic creatures. She aids Aquaman in his missions to protect the underwater kingdom and the surface world.
